TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ActiveDirectorySiteLink extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: The class represents a set of two or more sites that can be scheduled, for replication, to communicate at uniform cost and through a particular transport.
Initializes a new instance of the class.

The name for the site link.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class using the specified object and name.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The default transport type is RPC.

Docs.exception: A call to the underlying directory service resulted in an error.
The target server is either busy or unavailable.

This exception will occur for any of the following reasons.
- The target in the parameter is not a forest, configuration set, domain controller, or an AD LDS server.
- is an empty string.
or is .
The credentials that were supplied are not valid.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the site link cost.
Docs.value: A cost that is associated with this site link. The default value is 100.
Docs.exception: An Active Directory Domain Services operation failed. See the exception for details.
The cost is less than zero. (applies to set only)
